question.xref: DES s6, HC p102, KYTS p91
question.text: You are on a motorway. Red flashing lights appear above your lane only. What should you do?

explanation.text: Flashing red lights above your lane show that your lane is closed. You should move into another lane as soon as you can do so safely.

answer.text: Continue in that lane and look for further information
Move into another lane in good time
Stop and wait for an instruction to proceed
